lines.text: [the Stooges are looking for something to pry open a locked door]

[holding a crowbar]
You think this'll open it?

[taking crowbar]
Swell. Where'd you get it?
In the house.
Oh...
[Moe turns around and realizes the door is open]
In the house?
Yeah. Can you use it?
And how.
[Moe bonks Larry on the head with the crowbar]

[the police officer hears a sound coming from a trash can]
Who's in that can?
Just garbage!
[Slap]
Oh!

[the captian tries the lie detector on Shemp]
Now then, I gotta a couple of questions I wanna ask you!
Me?
Yes, and so of I. Did you or did not take that quarter out of my shoe last night?
On my honor, Moe I didn't do it.
[the alarm goes off]
What will it be, sir?
I'll take the short ribs.
I think we got some delicious chicken soup.
Just short ribs.
I know but you haven't tried our chicken soup I know because I...

[Grabs Larry by the collar]
Short ribs!
Short ribs. Chicken soup comin' up!
